title: The Best of The Herd with Colin Cowherd
itunes:title: The Best of The Herd with Colin Cowherd
description:
Colin's back to discuss the first big weekend of college football and why USC looks like an elite program once again under new head coach Lincoln Riley. He preaches patience for the 49ers and young QB Trey Lance after they decided to keep veteran Jimmy Garoppolo as their back up. He also tells you why he was right about Baker Mayfield and wrong about Russell Wilson. Plus, college football analyst Yogi Roth joins the show in studio to give his thoughts on USC and if they're ready to compete for a national championship. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
